snippet: German business software maker SAP said it will buy travel and expense management software company Concur Technologies for $129 per share, or about $7.36 billion....

headline.print_headline: SAP Will Buy Concur Technologies for $7.36 Billion
headline.main: SAP Will Buy Concur Technologies for $7.36 Billion

lead_paragraph: German business software maker SAP said it will buy travel and expense management software company Concur Technologies for $129 per share, or about $7.36 billion.
